# `extended_gini_fun`

extended_gini_fun


## Description

calculate gini coefficient on a minimum length vector


## Usage

```r
extended_gini_fun(x, weights = rep(1, length = length(x)), minimum_length = 16)
```


## Value

gini coefficient
